prompts: Create a Pokemon that resembles a small dinosaur with purple scales and large ears.
I want a creature that has spiky backs and sharp claws, primarily in shades of violet.
Generate a bipedal Pokemon with a unique horn and a fierce expression, mostly purple.
Make a Pokemon that looks like a mini dragon with a tough exterior and sharp spikes.
Imagine a creature that is agile and feisty, showcasing vibrant purple and teal colors.
Design a Pokemon with a muscular build and a striking appearance that stands out in battles.
Show me a Pokemon that embodies both elegance and strength, featuring a spiky silhouette.
